AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.name: Davidson Rafael Krisman Nugroho
AboutPage.bio: I'm a passionate learner who believes that every line of code is an opportunity to create something meaningful. Currently exploring the vast world of software development, from building modern web applications to diving deep into systems programming.
AboutPage.philosophy: Stay curious. Keep learning. Build things that matter.
